title: Edinburgh Airport (EGPH) receiving it's second update
description:
Edinburgh Airport (IATA: EDI, ICAO: EGPH) is an international airport situated in the Ingliston area of Edinburgh, Scotland. It was Scotland's busiest airport in 2019, serving over 14.7 million passengers, and the sixth busiest in the United Kingdom by passenger volume. The latest version represents the second update for the airport, which the developer asserts has been constructed from the ground up. The add-on boasts a range of appealing features and extensive details, encompassing both the airport itself and its vicinity.

For a full overview of items added to the marketplace this week have a look at the video below:
https://youtu.be/lnnhtTToYOc
